CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(Street__c) , null, Street__c & ', ') &
IF( ISBLANK(District__c) , null, District__c &', ') &
IF(ISBLANK(City__c), null, City__c &', ') &
IF(ISBLANK( TEXT( Province__c ) ) , null, TEXT( Province__c ) & ', ' ) &
IF(ISBLANK( TEXT( State__c ) ), null, TEXT( State__c ) & ', ') &
IF( ISBLANK(Zip_Code__c) , null, Zip_Code__c & ', ') &
TEXT( Country__c)
CustomField.label: Full Adress
